GSD.description:
video: fbdev: cirrusfb: check pixclock to avoid divide by zero

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 6fe23ff94e7840097202e85c148688940b37c9b1. For more details please see the references link.
